desc:
Fixed:
better detection of myst classes for resistance-decoding
Preferences display is much cleaner
Progress-bar changer removed; use the new Options->Interface->Progress Bars->Show substats per level instead of stats setting
New:
Pandamonium Arena logic puzzle solver
Spoilers for the new, improved Knob
Note!
To make the Lab store link work properly again, you need to go to the Optionarium, select [Custom Links 1], and choose Restore Defaults.
